title: To Make a Building Healthier, Stop Sanitizing Everything
itunes:title: To Make a Building Healthier, Stop Sanitizing Everything
description:
Improve the ventilation, even spread some good germs. If you want people to be healthy and productive, tend the microbiome.

Host: Carol Massar. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
